casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Leroy McNEIL. No. 37A87-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 22, 2005. Robert H. Hale, Jr., for McNeil. G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of February 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (McNeil) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of March 2005 to file his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of February 2005."
